prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Brotherhood of Railway, Airline, and Steamship Clerks, Freight Handlers, Express, and Station Employees : #5488 B. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

arrangement.head: COLLECTION ARRANGEMENT
arrangement.p: This forms a portion of collection #5488 B. The guide to the entire collection is available here.
Series XCVI is arranged in 190 sub-series by Union file number.
